a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: World crude oil price vs. oil consumption
Global crude oil price, measured in US dollars per cubic meter, against total oil consumption, measured in
average cubic meters per day. Prices are adjusted for inflation.
Data source: Energy Institute based on S&P Global Platts - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024); Energy Institute - Statistical
Note: Prices are expressed in constant 2022 US$.
